about_the_game:
In Broken Legends, you play as a 16-year-old who is possessed. This unknown force is giving you extreme power. Will you become this force or stop it?

WARNING: GAME CONTAINS MINOR FLASHING LIGHTS

Features:
  • Become a villain.
  • Start a massacre.
  • A compelling and unique story.
  • A few laughs.
  • Let all the houses burn to ash.
  • An ending to save people from you.
  • Sadness.
  • Great soundtrack.
  • A mixture of genres.
